title: "Chat" messaging: Conversation manager
content: Centralize your business communications with Emprez instant messaging. Chat in groups or privately with your employees in a professional atmosphere conducive to discussion. You will be notified by a notification when a new discussion is created or when a response is received. The "Chat" Messaging function comes in addition to the "Formal" Messaging, the latter being more suitable for official requests (days of leave, replacement of shifts ...)To take advantage of this option, please contact Emprez customer service, who will be happy to add it to you.Please note that this option is chargeable, it will cost you $ 0.25 / employee per month.Once the option is activated by our services, you will see the  icon appear in your main menu.Public conversation: Instant chat with the whole departmentStarting a public chat can only be done by a managerWill be visible, only people who use the Emprez mobile applicationPrivate conversation: Instant chat between 2 or more people from the same department: Create a private conversation with the person of your choice: Create a private conversation with several people (you + 2 other people minimum)Manager web PortalCreate a Public ConversationTo access the Chat Manager, in the main menu click on ,Simultaneously click on the Shift key on your keyboard and one of the two icons:   ou Give the public conversation a name, then click Save.Type your message to start the conversation with your team!People in the service will receive a notification on the Emprez application to let them know that they have received a new message.
